body_html:
It's by design MonitoredSession prevents access to raw_session. It re-creates raw_session time to time in case of specific exceptions.
please consider using MonitoredSession.run_step_fn for your use case.
body_text:
It's by design MonitoredSession prevents access to raw_session. It re-creates raw_session time to time in case of specific exceptions.
please consider using MonitoredSession.run_step_fn for your use case.
body:
It's by design MonitoredSession prevents access to raw_session. It re-creates raw_session time to time in case of specific exceptions.
please consider using `MonitoredSession.run_step_fn` for your use case.
